unpublishedAction.name: sms_slack_notify

actionConfiguration.body: {"text":{{"Hi <!channel> Payment for SMS ticket is approved. Code is - "+retailer_code_value.text + ". Add Credits - "+(+amount_paid_mod.text*5) + " & payment ID is " +payment_id_jd.text + ". The amount paid is Rs"+amount_paid_mod.text + ". Remarks added from accounts team -" +payment_remarks.text +""}}}

jsonPathKeys: "Hi <!channel> Payment for SMS ticket is approved. Code is - "+retailer_code_value.text + ". Add Credits - "+(+amount_paid_mod.text*5) + " & payment ID is " +payment_id_jd.text + ".
